thread.section_title: Pharma/Biotech Financing From Elsevier Business Intelligence
thread.title: Avitide closes $7.7mm Series C round

title: Avitide closes $7.7mm Series C round
text:
Avitide closes $7.7mm Series C round Deal Date: Aug-01-2015 / Deal # 201530621 Executive Summary 
Avitide Inc. (bioprocess affinity chromatography resins used in biopharmaceutical manufacturing) raised $7.7mm in Series C financing from 11 investors led by NeoMed Management, which contributed a board member, plus returning shareholders Polaris Partners, OrbiMed Advisors, SV Life Sciences, and Borealis Ventures. Avitide will use the money to commercialize its affinity purification technology; the company expects to be profitable within two years.
